name: FearMe
description:
A small adventure of horror, mystery, quirkiness with animated horrors and multiple endings. 

Will you be able to keep your sanity intact?

Make your choices and be careful not to split. 

Available in Windows/Mac and soon on web

Controls: 

Right Click for options or press ESC

Continue the narrative by clicking when seeing the blinking skull. 

Select choices and try to get the best ending if you can...
